Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ActivityController.ExceptionHandler Defines and splits the handling of various exceptions in a single place.
ActivityController.Interceptor An interface which is queried during the various life cycle events of a LifeCycle.
ActivityController.Redirector An interface which is requested when a new Activity is bound to be started.
AppPublics.BroadcastListener Indicates what kind of Intent are being listened to, and how to handle it.
AppPublics.BroadcastListenerProvider States that the Android Activity which implements this interface is able to provide an intent broadcast listener.
AppPublics.BroadcastListenersProvider States that the Android Activity which implements this interface is able to provide several broadcast listener.
AppPublics.LifeCyclePublic Because an Android Activity/Fragment entity can be destroyed and then recreated, following a configuration change (a screen orientation change, for instance), this interface gives information about an entity life cycle.
AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler.OnMultiSelectionChanged<BusinessObjectClass> The interface which is invoked by the AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler when a new selection event occurs.
AppPublics.SendLoadingIntent When an Activity implements that interface, it will send broadcast intents while loading and once the loading is over.
Smartable<AggregateClass> All activities and fragments of the framework implement this composite interface.
SmartCommands.GuardedHandler Defines a single contract which enables to turn an exception into another one.
Smarted<AggregateClass> Defines some common methods for all Activity and Fragment entities defined in the framework.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSmartListActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass,ListViewClass extends ViewGroup,ViewClass extends View> In order to propose a list activity which automates many things regarding its underlying business objects.
AbstractWrappedSmartListActivity<AggregateClass,ListViewClass extends ViewGroup> Uses wrapped business objects for simplifying the handling of heterogeneous business objects.
ActivityController Is responsible for intercepting an activity starting and redirect it to a prerequisite one if necessary, and for handling globally exceptions.
ActivityController.AbstractExceptionHandler A simple implementation of ActivityController.ExceptionHandler which pops-up error dialog boxes and toasts.
AppPublics Gathers some interfaces and helpers for the types belonging to its Java package.
AppPublics.LoadingBroadcastListener A broadcast listener which listens only to AppPublics.UI_LOAD_ACTION intents.
AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler<BusinessObjectClass extends Serializable> A helper which receives mutli-selection intents with an action set to AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler.SELECTION_ACTION, and which remembers and triggers event according to the current selection.
AppPublics.ReloadBroadcastListener A broadcast listener which listens only to loading intent actions.
Droid4mizer<AggregateClass,ComponentClass> The class that should be used when extending a legacy class to support the whole droid4me framework features.
ForBusinessObjectActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass> An activity which handles the persistence properly, which proposes a framework regarding the custom action, and which provides a framework regarding the activity life cycle.
ProgressHandler Provides a way to handle progress in an application, while it is computed something and the end-user is prompted to wait until a task completion.
ProgressHandler.ProgressExtra A structure which encapsulates extra completion and textual message information related to a progression event.
SmartActivity<AggregateClass> The basis class for all activities available in the framework.
SmartApplication An abstract to be implemented when using the framework, because it initializes some of the components, and eases the development.
SmartApplication.I18N Contains various attributes in order to have the default dialog boxes related to exceptions i18ned.
SmartCommands A container which encloses various types which enable to run commands in a detached thread.
SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand<ContextClass extends Context> A handy SmartCommands.GuardedCommand which will issue systematically a log when an exception occurs during the command execution, and will trigger a SmartCommands.GuardedException which wraps the original exception in that case.
SmartCommands.DialogGuardedCommand A handy SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand which will issue systematically dismiss a Dialog once the command execution is over.
SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<ContextClass extends Context> A Runnable used as command, which is allowed to throw an exception during its execution.
SmartCommands.GuardedDialogInterfaceClickListener A DialogInterface.OnClickListener which runs its execution in the low-priority threads pool, and which handles exceptions.
SmartCommands.GuardedViewClickListener A View.OnClickListener which runs its execution in the low-priority threads pool, and which handles exceptions.
SmartCommands.ProgressGuardedCommand Enables to execute in background a task, by notifying when the execution is running.
SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand A handy SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand dedicated to activities.
SmartCommands.SmartThreadPoolExecutor Introduced so as to be able to catch the exceptions thrown in the framework thread pools.
SmartDialogFragment<AggregateClass> A basis classes for designing a DialogFragment compatible with the framework, i.e. droid4me-ready.
SmartFragment<AggregrateClass> A basis classes for designing a Fragment compatible with the framework, i.e. droid4me-ready.
SmartGroupActivity<AggregateClass> A basis class for an activity that contains other activities.
SmartGroupActivity.Rotate3dAnimation This is taken from the Android API Demos source code!
SmartIntentService A IntentService with the logging feature.
SmartListActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass extends View> An instantiation of the AbstractSmartListActivity bound to the native ListView.
SmartMapActivity<AggregateClass> A basis class for an activity that holds a map.
SmartPreferenceActivity<AggregateClass> Makes the Android PreferenceActivity compatible with the framework.
SmartSplashScreenActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass> A basis activity class which is displayed while the application is loading.
SmartTabActivity<AggregateClass> A basis class for an activity that holds some tabs.
WrappedSmartListActivity<AggregateClass> An instantiation of the AbstractWrappedSmartListActivity bound to the native ListView.
 

Enum Summary
ActivityController.AbstractExceptionHandler.ConnectivityUIExperience Defines how the framework should behave when an Internet connectivity problem has been detected.
ActivityController.Interceptor.InterceptorEvent Defines all the events handled by the ActivityController.Interceptor.
 

Exception Summary
SmartCommands.GuardedException An exception which acts as an Throwable wrapper, and which works in combination with the SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand.
 

Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app Description

Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.
